logicId.Wiki: Determines what logic script the Npc uses

battleGoalID.Wiki: Determines what battle script the Npc uses

eye_BackOffsetDist_perceive.Wiki: This distance behind the center of the character is the viewing angle start position (recognition)

eye_BeginDist_perceive.Wiki: Do not recognize this distance from the visual angle generation position (recognition)

corpse_eye_dist_rate.Wiki: Search range when searching for corpses. Multiples eye_dist_normal

CorpseTargetForgetTime.Wiki: Time to forget the corpse target.

SightTargetForgetTime.Wiki: Time to forget the visual target.

idAttackCannotMove.Wiki: Animation that plays when the Npc cannot move passed on object

ear_dist.Wiki: Hearing distance, if an AI sound is within the hearing radius the enemy will hear the sound

ear_soundcut_dist.Wiki: Distance at which to reduce the size of the sound source. Sounds below this distance will not be heard.

nose_dist.Wiki: Npc will enter combat when an enemy is within this range

SoundTargetForgetTime.Wiki: Time to forget the sound target.

BattleStartDist.Wiki: Combat start distance, must but within the vision cone

callHelp_CallPeerId.Wiki: Companion group ID to call friends

TeamAttackEffectivity.Wiki: A value for determining the number of simultaneous attackers in a team. Each enemy adds their value to a pool and when that value exceeds 100 Npc aggresion is reduced via AI

disableDark.Wiki: Sight and Battle start disatnce will not be affected by darkness?

goalAction_ToCautionIndicationTarget.Wiki: Goal action: The target became alert due to the detection of the presence position.

callHelp_CallValidMinDistTarget.Wiki: If it's closer than this value, you can't call a friend.

callHelp_CallValidRange.Wiki: If the friend is farther than this value, it will not be called.

callHelp_MinWaitTime.Wiki: Minimum time in the first waiting goal of the responding goal [101=>10.1sec]

callHelp_MaxWaitTime.Wiki: Maximum time in first waiting goal of responding goal [101=>10.1sec]

goalAction_ToCaution.Wiki: Goal Action: The target is alerted by normal sound detection.

callHelp_ReplyBehaviorType.Wiki: Action type to target position after response

disablePathMove.Wiki: Ignore navmesh, even if one is present?

skipArrivalVisibleCheck.Wiki: Do you want to skip arrival determination by line of sight? When set to On, arrival judgment is performed even if the line of sight is not passing.

aroundTargetIncrementPoint.Wiki: The amount of discovery points incremented every second when you are in the peripheral vision cone

eye_BackOffsetDist_around.Wiki: This distance behind the center of the character is the viewing angle start position (peripheral)

eye_BeginDist_around.Wiki: Do not recognize this distance from the visual angle generation position (peripheral)

ignoreStealthTime.Wiki: Disable the target's stealth function (line-of-sight raycast check, visual cut) until you lose sight of the enemy continuously for the set time. [sec]

eye_BackOffsetDist_normal.Wiki: This distance behind the center of the character is the viewing angle start position (normal)

eye_BeginDist_normal.Wiki: Do not recognize this distance from the visual angle generation position (normal)

actTypeOnFailedPath.Wiki: Default action type to be performed when reaching the end point of the alternative path when the path search fails

goalAction_ToCautionImportant.Wiki: Goal action: The target became alert due to the detection of an important sound.

actTypeOnNonBtlFailedPath.Wiki: When the target is [None], the action to take after rewriting the current location to the nest

goalAction_ToCautionCorpseTarget.Wiki: Goal Action: Target is put on alert due to the discovery of a dead body

disableLocalSteering.Wiki: Disables an Npc's ability to move around other Npc's

changeStateAction_ToNormal.Wiki: Action when transitioning to normal state
